resources.string: Progress that newer than you loaded will be REMOVED!
You have won the final victory !
New Challenge will remove your progress of Tour and Challenge before
Auto Oxybeles:Large and powerful Oxybeles \r\n Arrows+1 per level
Prosperity:Improve the ability of the city to repair \r\n Repair+1 per level
Dragon Rocket:Launch high-explosive rockets\r\n Rocket+1 per level
Catapult:Catapult upon the gates\r\n Attack power up per level
Loyalty:Increase City HP\r\n + 50 HP per level,repair+1 every 2 level
Bamboo Musket:Cheap and personal handy firearm \r\n City auto defense,salvo+1 per level
Rocket Crow:The kite mounted the little rockets \r\n mother crow+1 every 4 level
Loud Bomb:Bomb compensates dead angle \r\n Can not control,Bomb+2 per level
On the way of Emperor ZhaoYuan\'s northern tour,The city is the temporary palace.\r\n The sentry found many suspicious in the distance.
Adjust Green bar that bottom left of the screen changes Shooting angle.\r\n click Flak Bottom right corner to launch.

You can click boots on the upper left corner to PAUSE or SCREENSHOT,
 When you have right Shooting angle,
 Auto Oxybeles will be good at dealing with a small group of enemies.
 They are coming ! launch!
Chapter 2:Reinforce defense:\r\n The mechanic accompanying emperor erected Catapult.\r\n Green bar to adjust,and click on the screen to launch !
Enemy spies got the emperor\'s whereabouts,\r\n before sending troops surround this border town.\r\n

Chapter 3:Enemy emerged:
 The enemy's messenger come to your town....
 The generals commanding the siege ,called 'wise master' AnLu,
 Said the messenger,His master's army is numerous, well equipped.
 And ordered us to open the gate,kneel down on both sides of the street.
 The emperor become angry from embarrassment
 Hope you can command a good fight.

The enemy's Crasher is terrifying,
 We can restore the vitality by fortress management
 Proposed to learn 'Prosperity' after the battle.
We just shot two heavy Infantry,\r\n They are fear , no mercy !\r\n

Chapter 4:Staged victory:
 They are flee,the enemy army retreated 2.5 kilometers.
 but they seem to build something.
they are trying to lead skirmishers to death,\r\n Could such a weak attack shake our city wall ?\r\n

Chapter 5:Jing siege tower:
 Anlu bet on everything.
 Their general offensive began...
 Zhao Yuan, the emperor made up into the commoner, preparing to flee.
 and left a tricks in the bag for you.
Anlu left instruction of \'total attack\',\r\n And then come to the front.\r\n
There is a gunner in the siege tower!\r\n we are doomed...\r\n

Chapter 6:Not delve:
 Anlu died in the Jing siege tower,
 Clean up the wreck of the tower get many materials.
 (HP + 180).
 Would the attack to the end?
The new vanguard of the enemy,named "siege master" Belkin Montgo \r\n Good at breaking into the city with diverse troops.
Belkin Montgo marking weaknesses of our defense with bannerman after, \r\n Notify his Dragon launcher shell to us!\r\n Kill those bannerman as soon as possible.

Chapter 7:Deratization:
 The enemy's messenger come to your town....
 Thore,father of Belkin Montgo,has arrived with reinforcements.
 The messenger has a message from Belkin Montgo: "If you don't surrender, I'll put the knife in your head..."
This a general offensive !\r\n Belkin Montgo in the attacking army now.\r\n It will be the formation of a new attack after he escaped, to seize this opportunity!
Chapter 8:Revenge:\r\n The body of Belkin Montgo was dragged away by them, Thore will avenge for his son.\r\n
Thore is battle-hardened,The Crasher will cover crossbowman and bannerman,\r\n Beware.

Chapter 9:Good rest:
 It is said,Thore was suddenly die of hematemesis in command.
 His vassals fled,this is a help from heaven.
 There is not much food in the city, just to see what can be eaten outside.
When the birds are close to the town, shoot at them,\r\n Don\'t let them fly over the town.
Angered the boar,let it come.\r\n Don\'t kill it too fast, or you can\'t get any food.

Chapter 10:King of the kings:
 The enemy's messenger come to your town....
 The enemy commander Deda has a fearsome brutal army,
 The army from the vast world under the rule of Deda!
 messenger has a message from Deda:
 "I admire your courage and perseverance, I pardon you..."
 "But you must promise that ZhaoYuan must die to me before ,"
 "and i must get 'Book of WuMu' that on ZhaoYuan "
The enemy troops were armed with firearm,\r\n One salvo enough to wreck the thickest wall!
Destroy the enemy on the horizon as soon as possible,\r\n Make sure our loss is least.
Deda\'s speed of troops deployment so quickly!\r\n

Chapter 11:Firepower Neutralization:
 The enemy ShenJi legion has deployed,
 The emperor no longer in the town,
 the trick in bag write on paper:
 "You should defense it well.thank you when i back."

Chapter 12:General offensive:
 Deda has divided troops into seven for different duty,.
 The enemy's messenger come to your town....
 looking very arrogant,
 messenger has a message from Deda:
 "When i capture you town,"
 "No one live,even one of grass!"
We are tough!HA!,\r\n Deda driving the last high-value troops to seek doom. \r\n The enemy\'s momentum is weak!

Chapter 13:FINAL BATTLE:
 Enemy infantry escorted a giant beast to the camp of Deda!
 This is the final battle, victory or defeat in this one!!!
 All commoners of the town,young and older,come to assist you of defending!
 (HP+500!)
Deda riding on the war elephant!\r\n
You just grabbed the city,\r\n Defense facilities needed to rebuild,\r\n Only passively waiting the counterattack force.
I think it should have been more serious.

Why do I think you're cheating?
 But thank you for you loving the game.
 Actually, I am looking for a full-time job to make game.
 I hope when you see that,
 my dream had come true.
 我最满意的部分是我绘制的那些山脉,
 有西藏的感觉,
 我在那里逗留过约四个月.
 如果你看完我的废话,
 你应该已经输了.
When you can not pass game,restart all,and change all of your skills !
